anya-e0802n4:3_0: Tesaṁ nāmānaṁ payujjamānapadatthānaṁ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n4:5_0: Nāmānamiti kimatthaṁ? Devadatto pacati, yaññadatto pacati.
anya-e0802n4:6_0: Yuttatthoti kimatthaṁ? Bhato rañño putto devadattassa.
anya-e0802n4:9_0: Tesaṁ yuttatthānaṁ samāsānaṁ vibhattiyo lopā ca honti.
anya-e0802n4:11_0: Tesaṁgahaṇena samāsataddhitākhyātakitakānaṁ vibhattipaccayapadakkharāgamā ca lopā honti. Vāsiṭṭho,
anya-e0802n4:12_0: Caggahaṇa mavadhāraṇatthaṁ, pabhaṅkaro, amataddado, medhaṅkaro, dīpaṅkaro.
anya-e0802n4:14_0: Luttāsu vibhattīsu assa sarantassa liṅgassa pakatirūpāni honti.
anya-e0802n4:18_0: Nagarassa samīpe pavattati kathā iti upanagaraṁ,
anya-e0802n4:18_8: sotassa pati pavattati nāvā iti patisotaṁ,
anya-e0802n4:22_0: Kumārīsu adhikicca pavattati kathā iti adhikumāri,
anya-e0802n4:22_1: vadhuyā samīpe pavattati kathā iti upavadhu,
anya-e0802n4:22_2: gaṅgāya samīpe pavattati kathā iti upagaṅgaṁ,
anya-e0802n4:22_3: maṇikāya samīpe pavattati kathā iti upamaṇikaṁ.
anya-e0802n4:26_0: 322, 359.Tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yoggasenaṅgakhuddajantuka vividhaviruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0802n4:27_0: Tathā dvande samāse pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgakhuddajantuka vividhaviruddha visabhāgatthaiccevamādīnaṁ ekattaṁ hoti,
anya-e0802n4:30_0: Phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṁ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṁ. Evaṁ yoggaṅgatthe.
anya-e0802n4:35_8: dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṁ iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n4:36_0: 323, 360.Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasukha na dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0802n4:37_0: Rukkhatiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadaiccevamādīnaṁ vibhāsā ekattaṁ hoti,
anya-e0802n4:40_0: Dve padāni tulyādhikaraṇāni yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso kammadhārayasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n4:41_0: Mahanto ca so puriso cāti mahāpuriso,
anya-e0802n4:41_1: kaṇho ca so sappo cāti kaṇhasappo,
anya-e0802n4:41_4: brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā,
anya-e0802n4:41_5: khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti khattiyakaññā.
anya-e0802n4:52_0: Tā amādayo nāmehi parapadebhi yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso tappurisasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n4:55_0: Aññesaṁ padānaṁ atthesu dve nāmāni bahūni nāmāni yadā samasyante,
anya-e0802n4:55_1: tadā so samāso bahubbīhi sañño hoti.
anya-e0802n4:56_0: Āgatā samaṇā imaṁ saṅghārāmaṁ soyaṁ āgatasamaṇo,
anya-e0802n4:56_2: Jitāni indriyāni anena samaṇena soyaṁ jitindriyo, samaṇo.
anya-e0802n4:56_3: Dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṁ dinnasuṅko, rājā.
anya-e0802n4:56_4: Niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṁ niggatajano, gāmo.
anya-e0802n4:56_5: Chinno hatto yassa purisassa soyaṁ chinnahattho, puriso.
anya-e0802n4:56_6: Sampannāni sassāni yasmiṁ janapade soyaṁ sampannasasso, janapado.
anya-e0802n4:57_1: nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṁ nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo.
anya-e0802n4:57_2: Atha vā nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo iva parimaṇḍalo yassa rājakumārassa soyaṁ nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo,
anya-e0802n4:58_0: Cakkhuno bhūto cakkhubhūto, cakkhubhūto iva bhūto yo bhagavā soyaṁ cakkhubhūto, bhagavā.
anya-e0802n4:59_0: Suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa bhagavato soyaṁ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, bhagavā.
anya-e0802n4:60_0: Brahmuno saro brahmassaro, brahmassaro viya saro yassa bhagavato soyaṁ brahmassaro, bhagavā.
anya-e0802n4:61_0: Sayaṁpatita paṇṇa pupphaphalavāyutoyāhārāti paṇṇañca pupphañca phalañca paṇṇapupphaphalāni,
anya-e0802n4:61_2: sayaṁpatitāni ca tāni paṇṇapupphaphalāni ceti sayaṁpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalāni vāyu ca toyañca vāyutoyāni,
anya-e0802n4:61_4: Sayaṁpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyāni āhārā yesaṁ te sayaṁpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyāhārā, isayo.
anya-e0802n4:63_0: Nānā dumapatita pupphavāsita sānūti nānāpakārā dumā nānādumā,
anya-e0802n4:63_2: nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni ceti nānādumapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0802n4:63_4: nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṁ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu,
anya-e0802n4:64_3: Nānādumapatitapupphehi vāsitasānū yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṁ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu,
anya-e0802n4:65_0: Byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭoti ambuṁ dhāretīti ambudharo, ko so? Pajjunno.
anya-e0802n4:65_2: byālambo ca so ambudharo cāti byālambambudharo,
anya-e0802n4:65_5: byālambamburebinducumbito kūṭo yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṁ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo.
anya-e0802n4:66_3: Byālambambudharabindūhi cumbitakūṭo yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṁ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo.
anya-e0802n4:67_0: Amita bala parakkamajutīti na mitā amitā,
anya-e0802n4:67_1: balañca parakkamo ca juti ca balaparakkamajutiyo,
anya-e0802n4:68_0: Pīṇorakkhaṁsabāhūti uro ca akkhañca aṁso ca bāhu ca urakkhaṁsabāhavo,
anya-e0802n4:68_1: pīṇā urakkhaṁsabāhavo yassa bhagavato soyaṁ pīṇorakkhaṁsabāhu.
anya-e0802n4:69_0: Pīṇa gaṇḍa vadana thanūrujaghanāti gaṇḍo ca vadanañca thano ca ūru ca jaghanañca gaṇḍavadanathanūrujaghanā,
anya-e0802n4:70_0: Vavara surāsura garuḍa manuja bhujaga gandhabba makuṭa kūṭa cumbita selasaṅghaṭṭita caraṇoti surā ca
anya-e0802n4:70_1: asurā ca garuḍā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā ca surāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbā,
anya-e0802n4:70_2: pavarā ca te surāsuragaruḍamanujabhujaga gandhabbā ceti pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbā,
anya-e0802n4:71_2: Pavarasurāsura garuḍamanujabhujaga gandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselehi saṅghaṭṭitacaraṇā yassa tathāgatassa
anya-e0802n4:72_0: Catuddisoti catasso disā yassa soyaṁ catuddiso, bhagavā.
anya-e0802n4:73_0: Pañcacakkhūti pañca cakkhūni yassa tathāgatassa soyaṁ pañcacakkhu, tathāgato.
anya-e0802n4:74_0: Dasabaloti dasa balāni yassa soyaṁ dasabalo, bhagavā.
anya-e0802n4:75_0: Anantañāṇoti nassa anto anantaṁ, anantaṁ ñāṇaṁ yassa tathāgatassa soyaṁ anantañāṇo, tathāgato.
anya-e0802n4:76_0: Amita ghana sarīroti na mitaṁ amitaṁ,
anya-e0802n4:76_2: amitaṁ ghanasarīraṁ yassa tathāgatassa soyaṁ amitaghanasarīro,
anya-e0802n4:77_0: Amita bala parakkama pattoti na mitā amitā,
anya-e0802n4:77_3: amitabalaparakkamā pattā yena soyaṁ amitabalaparakkamapatto, bhagavā.
anya-e0802n4:78_0: Matta bhamara gaṇa cumbita vikasitapupphavallināgarukkho pasobhita kandaroti mattā eva bhamarā mattabhamarā,
anya-e0802n4:80_0: Nānārukkha tiṇa patita pupphopasobhita kandaroti rukkho ca tiṇañca rukkhatiṇāni,
anya-e0802n4:80_3: nānārukkhatiṇapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni ceti nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0802n4:81_1: (sāpekkhatte satipi gamakattā samāso.) Nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphehi upasobhitakandarāni yassa pabbatarājassa
anya-e0802n4:82_0: Nānā musala phāla pabbata taru kaliṅgara sara dhanugadāsi tomarahatthāti musalo ca phālo ca pabbato ca
anya-e0802n4:82_1: taru ca kaliṅgaro ca saro ca dhanu ca gadā caasi ca tomaro,
anya-e0802n4:85_0: Nāmānaṁ ekavibhattikānaṁ yo samuccayo, so dvandasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n4:89_0: Tesaṁ mahantasaddānaṁ mahāādeso hoti tulyādhikaraṇe pade.
anya-e0802n4:90_0: Mahanto ca so puriso cāti mahāpuriso,
anya-e0802n4:90_1: mahantī ca sā devī cāti mahādevī,
anya-e0802n4:90_3: mahanto ca so nāgo cāti mahānāgo,
anya-e0802n4:90_4: mahanto ca so yaso cāti mahāyaso,
anya-e0802n4:90_6: mahantī ca sā nadī cāti mahānadī,
anya-e0802n4:90_7: mahanto ca so maṇi cāti mahāmaṇi,
anya-e0802n4:90_8: mahanto ca so gahapatiko cāti mahāgahapatiko,
anya-e0802n4:90_10: mahanto ca so puñño cāti mahāpuñño.
anya-e0802n4:91_0: Bahuvacanaggahaṇena kvaci mahanta saddassa mahādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n4:93_0: Itthiyaṁ tulyādhikaraṇe pade ce bhāsitapumitthī pumāva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0802n4:94_0: Dīghā jaṅghā yassa soyaṁ dīghajaṅgho, kalyāṇabhariyo, pahūtapañño.
anya-e0802n4:95_0: Bhāsitapupeti kimatthaṁ? Brāhmaṇabandhu ca sā bhariyā cātibrāhmaṇabandhubhariyā.
anya-e0802n4:97_0: Kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṁ tulyādhikaraṇe pade pubbe bhāsitapumitthī ce,
anya-e0802n4:100_0: Nassa padassa tappurise uttarapade attaṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n4:101_0: Nabrāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, avasalo, abhikkhu, apañcavassaṁ, apañcagavaṁ.
anya-e0802n4:103_0: Nassa padassa tappurise ana ādeso hoti sare pare.
anya-e0802n4:107_0: Kucchitaṁ annaṁ kadannaṁ, kucchitaṁ asanaṁ kadassanaṁ.
anya-e0802n4:108_1: Kucchitā dārā yesaṁ (apuññakārānaṁ) te hontīti kudārā, kujanā.
anya-e0802n4:112_0: Bahuvacanaggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Kuiccetassa anappatatthesupi kvaci kā hoti, kāpurisā.
anya-e0802n4:114_0: Samāsantagatānaṁ nāmānamanto saro kvaci akāro hoti.
anya-e0802n4:117_0: Nadīantā ca kattuantā ca kapaccayo hoti samāsante.
anya-e0802n4:118_0: Bahū nadiyo yasmiṁ soyaṁ bahunadiko, janapado. Bahavo kattāro yassa soyaṁ bahukattuko, puriso.
anya-e0802n4:121_0: Bahū nadiyo yasmiṁ soyanti bahunadiko. Bahū kantiyo yassa soyanti bahukantiko. Bahunāriko.
anya-e0802n4:123_0: Jāyāiccetāya tudaṁ jāniiccete ādesā honti patimhi pare.
anya-e0802n4:129_0: Tasmā akārantā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ kvaci aṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n4:130_0: Adhicittaṁ, yathāvuḍḍhaṁ, upakumbhaṁ, yāvajīvaṁ, tiropabbataṁ, tiropākāraṁ, tirokuṭṭaṁ, antopāsādaṁ.
anya-e0802n4:133_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa abyayībhāvasamāsassa liṅgassa saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0802n4:134_0: Kumārīsu adhikicca pavattati kathā iti adhikumāri. Upavadhu, upagaṅgaṁ, upamaṇikaṁ.
anya-e0802n4:136_0: Aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā anakārantā parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo ca hoti.
